mapper.select: SELECT b.RESOURCE_ID,SUPER_RESOURCE_ID,RESOURCE_NAME,RESOURCE_URL,RESOURCE_ORDER FROM T_OPERATOR_AUTH a,T_RESOURCE b WHERE a.RESOURCE_ID = b.RESOURCE_ID AND OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId} ORDER BY SUPER_RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_ORDER, RESOURCE_ID

SELECT ROLE_ID,b.RESOURCE_ID,SUPER_RESOURCE_ID,RESOURCE_NAME,RESOURCE_URL,RESOURCE_ORDER FROM T_ROLE_AUTH a,T_RESOURCE b WHERE a.RESOURCE_ID = b.RESOURCE_ID AND ROLE_ID = #{roleId} ORDER BY SUPER_RESOURCE_ID, RESOURCE_ORDER, RESOURCE_ID
